info.title: GooseTrack
info.description: [**GooseTrack**](https://github.com/IngvarVG76/GooseTrack-with-backend-3.0) is an intuitive calendar app that helps you stay organized and on top of your tasks.

get.summary: Retrieves an info about current user.
Retrieves an info about current user.

patch.summary: Update user info and upload avatar
Update user info and upload avatar

get.summary: Returns a list of all tasks by parameters.

post.summary: Returns a list of all tasks by parameters.

get.summary: Returns a list of all reviews.
Returns a list of all current user reviews.

end.description: End time. In `HH:mm` format. Must be greater than `start`.

date.description: Day on which to schedule a task. In [ISO 8601 date format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

priority.description: Priority of a task. Possible values: `"LOW", "MEDIUM", "HIGH"`

category.description: The category of a task. Possible values: `"TODO", "INPROGRESS", "DONE"`
